expected_finding.legal_basis: LL152 - Local Law 152 of 2016 (Gas Piping System Periodic Inspection)
expected_finding.explanation: Building 1234567 in Community District 6 is in the 2026 LL152 due-cycle. GPS2 gas piping inspection certification is MISSING. Failure to file by December 31, 2026 results in $10,000 fine plus daily penalties.
expected_finding.suggested_action: Hire Licensed Master Plumber (LMP) to conduct GPS2 inspection and file certification with DOB.
